Package sicsim.network.core

Contains the classes of the networking.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Bandwidth This class maintains the structure to store the information of upload/download bandwidth of peers and provides the methods to work with this structure.
CoreNet This class represents the core network in the system.
FailureDetector This class prepare a failure detector that helps peer to detect the failure of other peers in the overlay.
Monitor This is an abstract class that provides a global view to the whole peers in system.
Network This class provides a platform that contains all the peers in the system, regardless if they have joined the overlay or not.
OverlayNetwork This class provides a platform that contains all the peers have joined the overlay network.
 

Package sicsim.network.core Description

Contains the classes of the networking.

Package Specification

Contains the classes of the networking, e.g. network, overlay, bandwidth, failure detector, and etc.
